alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:37PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LEE COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southwest Florida Airport, or 9 miles southeast of Fort Myers, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, and Three Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
